SEL vs. Classroom Management

SEL is when students manage themselves and classroom management is when adults manage students. Can you identify examples of SEL and examples of classroom management? In the activity below, you will see two columns and six tiles. Fill out the two columns below with the tiles by dragging and dropping each tile to its appropriate column. Can you get the correct three in each column?
